title: 2  ORCA Sample Management Database
text:
3 Introduction
Datebase can only be accessed on-campus? at the following website https://orca.otago.nz/orca. This site provides an overview of the samples contained in the Sample Database.
To enter sample information into the database the administration screen need to be entered. This screen can be accessed using the following https://orca.otago.nz/orca/admin






Figure 3.1: Introductory screen for the ORCA Sample Database



The view upon entering the admin screen can be seen in Figure 3.1
